column3: You say I sound silly when I laugh real loud
column4: Talk about my day and you tune me out
column5: You keep telling me lies to make things worse
column7: Cause Im listening to his words
column10: And he says I am beautiful
column12: It dont matter that Im not perfect
column15: And in his eyes Im so worth it
column18: And even when you say Im not
column22: You say Ill never be good enough
column25: And you always say the right thing to make hurt
column27: Cause Im listening to his words
column34: I got to do what's right for me
column44: And even when you say Im not
